1.0.0.name: connect20/All_Reviews
1.0.0.description: All Reviews allows you to display all reviews of your products on a single CMS page. Customers searching Google, Bing, Yahoo for "YOUR STORE Reviews" will be able to find a page controlled by you with recent reviews of your products.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
